name: NOT that DEAD (Noentiendo2005)
description:
NOT that DEAD (⊙_⊙;)
----------------------------------------
Still fixing  bugs and glitches
----------------------------------------
Z - Select, Interact, Pass text...
X - Inventory...
Arrow Keys - Move...
----------------------------------------
Some enemies are harder to kill, but easier to spook!
----------------------------------------

This project was made in less than 7 days!╰(*°▽°*)╯
----------------------------------------
This game is inspired by Earthbound... (And a little Undertale of course)
----------------------------------------

Music grabbed from different games like Pokémon Mystery Dungeon, Mario & Luigi or Pokemon Sword and Shield...

Enjoy!!! (●'◡'●)
